title: Did President Trump say, "This is the end of my presidency. I'm F*cked after Muller's appointment?
subtitle: According to Muller ' s report, American President Donald Trump was not eager to appoint a special lawyer.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: "The investigation report on the Russian intervention in the 2016 presidential election" documents President Donald Trump's reaction to the appointment of Special Advocate Robert Mueller: "This is the end of my presidency, I am finished."
